name: pkgsign
description: A CLI tool for signing and verifying npm and yarn packages.
author: Redpoint Games

scripts.pkgsign: rimraf dist && tsc && node util/normalize.js && node dist/index.js
scripts.sign: rimraf dist && tsc && node util/normalize.js && node dist/index.js sign .
scripts.verify: rimraf dist && tsc && node util/normalize.js && node dist/index.js verify . --full
scripts.signedpack: rimraf dist && tsc && node util/normalize.js && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz
scripts.release: ava-ts && rimraf dist && tsc && node util/normalize.js && node util/ensure-release.js && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz && yarn publish pkgsign.tgz
scripts.prerelease: ava-ts && rimraf dist && tsc && node util/normalize.js && node util/ensure-prerelease.js && yarn pack --filename pkgsign.tgz && node dist/index.js sign pkgsign.tgz && yarn publish pkgsign.tgz --tag next
